hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Hani' that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) performed Ghusl, he and Maimunah from a single vessel, a bowl in which there were traces of dough

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِغْتِسَالِ فِي الْقَصْعَةِ الَّتِي يُعْجَنُ فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: Mention Of Ghusl Using A Bowl In Which Dough Is Mixed
